Footnotes should not parse as citations
.
Inline note ^[which contains a @citation]
.
<p>Inline note <sup class="footnote-ref"><a href="#fn1" id="fnref1">[1]</a></sup></p>
<hr class="footnotes-sep">
<section class="footnotes">
<ol class="footnotes-list">
<li id="fn1" class="footnote-item"><p>which contains a (AuthorInText||citation|) <a href="#fnref1" class="footnote-backref">↩︎</a></p>
</li>
</ol>
</section>
.
